title: One command —— 指令一键生成网站
author: 凋零蛋
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
xcc
replies.txt_content: 也就是说这是一个生成指令的网站?全是英文QUQ

/summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~1 ~ {Command:kill @e[type=MinecartCommandBlock,r=1],Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~ ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~-3 ~-1 ~ ~ ~ air},Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~ redstone_block,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~-1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~1 ~ ~1 stone},Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 redstone_block},Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~4 ~-2 ~-1 command_block 0 replace {Command:gamemode},Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~2 ~-2 ~-2 ~5 ~-2 ~2 stained_glass 3 replace stained_hardened_clay 3,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~2 ~-3 ~-2 ~5 ~-1 ~2 stained_hardened_clay 3 hollow,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:activator_rail,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:stone,Time:1}}}}}}}}}}}}}}写了一个gamemode
